summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light and Engineering Departments; authorizing transfer of partial jurisdiction over certain City (City Light Department) property in Blocks 29 and 30, C.D. Hillman's Meadow Gardens Addition to the City of Seattle Division No. 4, in King County, Washington, to the Engineering Department for Street purposes. (P.M. 230402-3-306, -312 and -313; RW 7920-4).
